verses.name: Acts 17:16
verses.text: Now while Paul waited for them at Athens, his spirit was stirred in him, when he saw the city wholly given to idolatry.

verses.name: Acts 17:17
verses.text: Therefore disputed he in the synagogue with the Jews, and with the devout persons, and in the market daily with them that met with him.

verses.name: Acts 17:18
verses.text: Then certain philosophers of the Epicureans, and of the Stoicks, encountered him. And some said, What will this babbler say? other some, He seemeth to be a setter forth of strange gods: because he preached unto them Jesus, and the resurrection.
